message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DL. 

The paper deals with generating answers to product-related questions in e-commerce portals, which involves natural language processing and machine learning techniques. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also involves information retrieval (IR) and machine learning (LG) techniques, which makes cs.IR and cs.LG likely sub-categories as well. Additionally, the paper proposes an adversarial learning based model, which falls under the sub-categories of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and deep learning (cs.DL).
